name: Super Flight Simulator
description: This is a simple flight simulator game. If using a mouse and keyboard, LEFT CLICK or press CTRL to accelerate. Press S to pitch up, and press W to pitch down. Press A and D to roll left and right respectively, and use Q and E to yaw left and right. If using a game controller, hold X to accelerate. Move the LEFT STICK DOWN to pitch up, and move the LEFT STICK UP to pitch down. Move the LEFT STICK LEFT and RIGHT to roll left and right respectively. Press Y and A to yaw left and right.
